title: Indesign crashes when inserting ligatures from the Glyphs pallette.
content:
Hi there.

I have this opentype font I made and almost everything is working fine except just this one thing.

Indesign crashes when I try to insert a glyph from the Glyphs palette. Actually there are only problems when I try to insert certain ligatures. These ligatures are fi fl ffi ffl and st. There are no problems with other characters or other ligatures(sp ct ch).

It is really irritating because I have absolutely no idea why this is happening. :(

Hope somebody can help.

Magnus
author: magnus_gaarde
